TEST CRITERIA: User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX)
Ease of Navigation: Assess how intuitive and easy it is for renters and bike owners to navigate the web application. The interface should be clean user-friendly and require minimal instructions.
POOR: Navigation is confusing with unclear menu structure and users frequently get lost. Multiple clicks needed to access basic features.
FAIR: Navigation is somewhat intuitive but some features are hard to find. Users need occasional guidance to locate specific functions.
GOOD: Navigation is mostly intuitive with clear menu structure. Most users can navigate without assistance.
VERY GOOD: Navigation is highly intuitive with excellent menu organization. Users can easily find all features with minimal effort.

TEST CRITERIA: Aesthetic Design: Evaluate the overall look and feel of the application. The design should be appealing consistent and suited to a local urban lifestyle.
POOR: Design is inconsistent with poor color choices and unprofessional appearance. Layout is cluttered and unattractive.
FAIR: Design is somewhat consistent but lacks polish. Some elements feel outdated or don't match the eco-friendly theme.
GOOD: Design is clean and consistent with good use of colors and spacing. Professional appearance with eco-friendly theme.
VERY GOOD: Design is exceptional with modern aesthetic consistent branding and excellent visual hierarchy. Perfectly suited for urban lifestyle.

TEST CRITERIA: Functionality
Bike Listing and Discovery: Test how well renters can search for browse and view detailed information about available bikes including filtering by type location and price.
POOR: Search and filter functions do not work properly. Bike details are incomplete or missing. Users cannot find relevant bikes.
FAIR: Search works but filters are limited or inaccurate. Some bike information is missing or unclear.
GOOD: Search and filters work well with good results. Bike details are comprehensive and easy to understand.
VERY GOOD: Search and filters are excellent with instant accurate results. Bike details are comprehensive with high-quality images and clear information.

TEST CRITERIA: Booking System: Assess the process of booking a bike including selecting dates confirming availability and viewing booking status.
POOR: Booking process is confusing with unclear steps. Date selection is problematic and availability is not accurately shown.
FAIR: Booking process works but has some confusing steps. Date selection could be improved and availability updates are delayed.
GOOD: Booking process is straightforward with clear steps. Date selection works well and availability is mostly accurate.
VERY GOOD: Booking process is seamless and intuitive. Date selection is excellent with real-time availability updates and clear confirmation.

TEST CRITERIA: Wallet and Payment: Evaluate loading funds via GCash/QRPH completing transactions and viewing payment history.
POOR: Wallet loading fails frequently. Payment transactions are unreliable. Payment history is incomplete or inaccessible.
FAIR: Wallet loading works but is slow. Payment transactions sometimes fail. Payment history is available but hard to navigate.
GOOD: Wallet loading works reliably. Payment transactions complete successfully. Payment history is accessible and clear.
VERY GOOD: Wallet loading is instant and seamless. Payment transactions are fast and reliable. Payment history is comprehensive with detailed transaction information.

TEST CRITERIA: Location Tracking and Geofencing: Test real-time location tracking for renters and geofence violation alerts for owners. Assess accuracy and notification delivery.
POOR: Location tracking does not work or is highly inaccurate. Geofence alerts are not delivered or are delayed significantly.
FAIR: Location tracking works but is sometimes inaccurate. Geofence alerts are delivered but with noticeable delays.
GOOD: Location tracking works well with good accuracy. Geofence alerts are delivered promptly with clear notifications.
VERY GOOD: Location tracking is highly accurate with real-time updates. Geofence alerts are instant and reliable with clear actionable notifications.

TEST CRITERIA: Owner Dashboard: Ensure that bike owners can easily manage listings bookings track earnings and monitor active rentals.
POOR: Owner dashboard is confusing with missing features. Earnings tracking is inaccurate. Booking management is difficult.
FAIR: Owner dashboard has basic features but some functions are hard to find. Earnings tracking works but lacks detail. Booking management is functional but could be improved.
GOOD: Owner dashboard is well-organized with most features easily accessible. Earnings tracking is accurate. Booking management is straightforward.
VERY GOOD: Owner dashboard is excellent with intuitive layout and comprehensive features. Earnings tracking is detailed and accurate. Booking management is seamless and efficient.

TEST CRITERIA: ID Verification System: Test the owner ID document upload OCR validation and verification process.
POOR: ID upload fails frequently. OCR validation does not work. Verification process is unclear or broken.
FAIR: ID upload works but is slow. OCR validation is sometimes inaccurate. Verification process is functional but confusing.
GOOD: ID upload works reliably. OCR validation is mostly accurate. Verification process is clear and straightforward.
VERY GOOD: ID upload is fast and seamless. OCR validation is highly accurate. Verification process is intuitive with clear status updates.

TEST CRITERIA: Performance
Response Time: Evaluate how fast the application responds to user inputs loading data and refreshing views.
POOR: Application is very slow with frequent delays. Page loads take more than 10 seconds. User actions have noticeable lag.
FAIR: Application is somewhat slow with occasional delays. Page loads take 5-10 seconds. Some user actions have minor lag.
GOOD: Application responds reasonably fast. Page loads take 2-5 seconds. Most user actions are responsive.
VERY GOOD: Application is very fast and responsive. Page loads take less than 2 seconds. All user actions are instant.

TEST CRITERIA: Battery Usage: Assess how the application affects device battery especially during location tracking and extended use.
POOR: Application drains battery very quickly. Location tracking causes significant battery drain. App is not usable for extended periods.
FAIR: Application has noticeable battery impact. Location tracking causes moderate battery drain. Extended use is possible but not ideal.
GOOD: Application has minimal battery impact. Location tracking is optimized. Extended use is comfortable.
VERY GOOD: Application is highly optimized with minimal battery impact. Location tracking is efficient. Extended use has negligible battery drain.

TEST CRITERIA: Security and Privacy
User Verification: Assess the robustness of the registration email verification and identity verification system.
POOR: Registration process is insecure. Email verification does not work. Identity verification is easily bypassed.
FAIR: Registration process has basic security. Email verification works but is unreliable. Identity verification has some vulnerabilities.
GOOD: Registration process is secure with proper validation. Email verification works reliably. Identity verification is robust.
VERY GOOD: Registration process is highly secure with comprehensive validation. Email verification is instant and reliable. Identity verification is foolproof with multiple checks.

TEST CRITERIA: Data Privacy: Evaluate whether personal information is stored and handled securely with proper encryption and access controls.
POOR: Data is stored insecurely with no encryption. Personal information is accessible without proper authorization. Privacy policies are unclear.
FAIR: Data storage has basic security measures. Some personal information may be vulnerable. Privacy policies exist but are incomplete.
GOOD: Data is stored securely with encryption. Personal information is protected with proper access controls. Privacy policies are clear and comprehensive.
VERY GOOD: Data storage is highly secure with strong encryption. Personal information is fully protected with strict access controls. Privacy policies are detailed and transparent.

TEST CRITERIA: User Engagement
Notifications and Alerts: Test the delivery and clarity of booking confirmations cancellations geofence violations and system updates.
POOR: Notifications are not delivered or are significantly delayed. Messages are unclear or confusing. Badge counts are inaccurate.
FAIR: Notifications are delivered but with delays. Messages are somewhat clear. Badge counts are sometimes inaccurate.
GOOD: Notifications are delivered promptly. Messages are clear and informative. Badge counts are accurate.
VERY GOOD: Notifications are delivered instantly via SignalR. Messages are very clear and actionable. Badge counts update in real-time.

TEST CRITERIA: Review and Feedback System: Evaluate if users (renters and owners) can leave ratings reviews and flag issues efficiently.
POOR: Review system does not work or is inaccessible. Users cannot submit ratings or reviews. Issue reporting is not available.
FAIR: Review system is functional but has limitations. Submitting ratings is possible but cumbersome. Issue reporting is basic.
GOOD: Review system works well with easy submission. Ratings and reviews are accessible. Issue reporting is functional.
VERY GOOD: Review system is excellent with intuitive interface. Ratings and reviews are comprehensive. Issue reporting is efficient with clear follow-up.

TEST CRITERIA: Reliability
Crash Reports: Monitor for crashes during navigation search payment booking and location tracking flows.
POOR: Application crashes frequently during normal use. Critical features are unstable. Data loss occurs during crashes.
FAIR: Application crashes occasionally. Some features are unstable. Minor data issues may occur.
GOOD: Application is stable with rare crashes. Most features work reliably. No data loss during crashes.
VERY GOOD: Application is highly stable with no crashes. All features work reliably. Robust error recovery prevents data loss.

TEST CRITERIA: Error Handling: Evaluate how the application responds to missing data bad internet connection or invalid inputs.
POOR: Application crashes or freezes on errors. No error messages are shown. Bad connections cause data loss.
FAIR: Application handles some errors but messages are unclear. Bad connections cause issues. Invalid inputs are sometimes accepted.
GOOD: Application handles errors gracefully with clear messages. Bad connections are handled reasonably. Invalid inputs are properly validated.
VERY GOOD: Application handles all errors elegantly with helpful messages. Bad connections are handled seamlessly with offline capabilities. Invalid inputs are prevented with clear validation feedback.

TEST CRITERIA: Integration with Urban Lifestyle
Mobile-First Design: Assess how the application performs on various screen sizes mobile devices and browsers.
POOR: Application does not work well on mobile devices. Layout is broken on small screens. Touch interactions are problematic.
FAIR: Application works on mobile but has layout issues. Some features are difficult to use on small screens. Touch interactions need improvement.
GOOD: Application works well on mobile devices with responsive design. Most features are accessible on small screens. Touch interactions are functional.
VERY GOOD: Application is perfectly optimized for mobile with excellent responsive design. All features are easily accessible on any screen size. Touch interactions are smooth and intuitive.

TEST CRITERIA: Local Relevance: Ensure that listings payment methods (GCash QRPH) address validation and features are relevant to Cebu City's commuting needs.
POOR: Payment methods are not available or do not work. Address validation is inaccurate for local areas. Features do not match local needs.
FAIR: Payment methods work but are limited. Address validation works for some areas. Some features are relevant.
GOOD: Payment methods work well including GCash and QRPH. Address validation is accurate for local areas. Features match local commuting needs.
VERY GOOD: Payment methods are comprehensive and seamless including all local options. Address validation is highly accurate for Cebu City. Features perfectly match and enhance local commuting needs.
